twoSetSkill.name: Spatial Erosion 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Mei or Yae Sakura equip bonus: Each repeated hit on the same target (resets if no attacks occur in 2.5s) boosts the next hit by 3% Crit Rate (max 15%) and 8% Crit DMG (max 40%) per hit.

threeSetSkill.name: Pocket Dimension 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When character is deployed and above 60% HP, enemy suffers 15% Total DMG Reduction to their attack and 10% more Total DMG Multiplier in damage taken. Effect cannot stack.
